title: GET_HELI_ENGINE_HEALTH
content:
0xA0FA0354// GetHeliEngineHealth
int GET_HELI_ENGINE_HEALTH(Vehicle heli);Parameters:heli: The helicopter to checkReturns: Returns the current health of the helicopter's engine.Note This native will always return 1000.0 unless SET_VEHICLE_BODY_HEALTH, SET_VEHICLE_ENGINE_HEALTH, or SET_VEHICLE_PETROL_TANK_HEALTH have been called with a value greater than 1000.0.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_HELI_ENGINE_HEALTH
GetHeliEngineHealth(vehicle)
